review: This little thing totally transformed my HD non-smart TV. Fantastinc experience, so easy no nonsense plugging and using. Programming and linking it to my Amazon and internet accounts were so easy and quick. And the Amazon interface is really attractive and easy to use (although for now I am not paying and using my Netflix account only). Available apps could be more, asume Amazon will add more over time. Important omissions for example YouTube and Google.
